bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: Pathological Condition identical with tuo gang 脫肛 , prolapse of the rectum. Qian jin bei ji fang 千金備急方 26: 豬洞腸， 主洞腸挺出血多者 , “A hog’s intestinal cavity controls prolapse of the cavernous intestine with profuse bleeding”. LSZ: 洞腸，廣腸也 , “The ‘cavernous intestine’ is the ‘wide intestine’”. Dong chuang 凍瘡 , frost sores [31]
Pathological Condition of chuang 瘡 , sores, conditions resulting from cold harming the skin. Ming yi bie lu 名醫別錄 Substance Entry tu tou gu 兔頭骨：腦，主凍瘡 , “Its brain controls frost sores ”.
